column5: Check out Daves promo for season two.. its pretty funny...  http://www.factsoffishing.com/videos.php?id=33  We are just a few weeks away from the new season of Facts of Fishing The Show. Season 2 will start Dec 10th on WFN at 8pm and Dec 13th on The Score at 9am.
Maybe he will fish for more than just Smallmouth this time around.
Saw the ad on facebook, pretty funny stuff. I think 'ol Dave should host a new SCTV. lol
